NK037(ji)010:1: // dpal ldan mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po drag sngags
NK037(ji)010:2: gsang ba spu gri'i smin byed chu 'babs su bkod
NK037(ji)010:3: pa mthu stobs rab 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so
NK037(ji)010:4: // na mahsh+r+ai gu ru ga na pa ti ye /
NK037(ji)010:5: thugs rje'i spyan ras 'gro kun la gzigs pas //
NK037(ji)010:6: gdul daka'i gnyen por gtum drag 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
NK037(ji)010:7: rjes brtse'i byin mthu bdag la dbab nas kyang //
NK037(ji)010:8: mkhyen brtse nus pa rgyas pa'i dge legs stsol //
NK037(ji)010:9: mdo smad ljongs su dar che yang //
NK037(ji)010:10: smin byed lag len tshul bzhin du //
NK037(ji)010:11: 'chad dang nod pa dkon pas na //
NK037(ji)010:12: 'dir la rnam gsal bsdeb par bya //
NK037(ji)010:13: lo chen bee ro tsa na'i thugs bcud /
NK037(ji)010:14: drag sngags gsang ba spu gri'i rgyud dang 'grel ba'i
NK037(ji)010:15: mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po bka' gter zung 'jug
NK037(ji)010:16: gi dbang bskur bka' gtad bcas bsgrub pa la gsum
NK037(ji)010:17: / sbyor ba yo byad bsham zhing sgrub mchod bya ba /
NK037(ji)010:19: rjes kyi cho ga ji ltar bya ba'o //
NK037(ji)010:21: stegs bu'i dbus su dkyil 'khor sgo rdzogs dur khrod
NK037(ji)010:22: rdo ra me ri sogs khro dkyil spyi mtshungs la
NK037(ji)010:23: / lte bar gru gsum mthing nag /
NK037(ji)010:26: de rgyab rtsibs brgyad gnyis ka sngon po la mgon po yab yum /
NK037(ji)010:30: sgo bzhir rgyal chen bzhi so so'i lha mtshan rgyas
NK037(ji)010:31: bsdus gang 'grub bkod pa can gyi dbus su rkang
NK037(ji)010:32: gsum bum pa mgul chings mthing nag kha rgyan bcud
NK037(ji)010:33: ldan gzungs rdor bcas pa dang /
NK037(ji)010:34: gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi lha tsaka /
NK037(ji)010:35: shar du lcags sam thod pa'i snod du zan la
NK037(ji)010:36: ri rab bang rim bzhi pa'i steng gtor ma snying
NK037(ji)010:37: la zur gtod pa lta bu'i ngos gsum du bshos
NK037(ji)010:38: phran gsum gyis bskor ba la dar nag ngos su
NK037(ji)010:39: bris pa'i sku'am sngags byang btsugs pa g.yag lug gi
NK037(ji)010:41: lhor gri snying srog 'khor dang bcas pa /
NK037(ji)010:42: nub tu thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba /
NK037(ji)010:43: byang du sgrol phur thun dang mtshon cha lid+ga hom snod bcas pa /
NK037(ji)010:44: de dag gi rgyab ngos su bdag bskyed yi dam gang la brten pa'i gtor ma /
NK037(ji)010:45: mdun ngos su sman raka gtor gsum /
NK037(ji)010:46: phyi mchod phreng tshar du bshams shing las bum sngon gtor tshogs kyi chas sogs 'du bya /
NK037(ji)010:47: de nas bdag bskyed bka' brgyad lta bu'i yi dam gang la brten kyang rung mod /
NK037(ji)010:48: 'di nyid kyi sprul gzhi spyan ras gzigs yin pa'i
NK037(ji)010:49: gnad kyis thugs rje chen po dang rta mgrin gang
NK037(ji)010:50: yang rung ba zhig la mdzad pa brgyud pa'i bla
NK037(ji)010:51: ma rnams kyi phyag len yin pas /
NK037(ji)010:53: bzlas pa stong tshigs yan chad grub pa dang /
NK037(ji)010:54: mgon po'i mngon rtogs gsang ba spu gri'am /
NK037(ji)010:55: bsdu na gab thig tsam gyis mdun gyi dkyil 'khor bum gtor rnams lhar bskyed cing /
NK037(ji)010:56: spyan 'dren mchod bstod sogs grub nas /
NK037(ji)010:57: bsnyen pa'i skabs su babs pa'i tshe /
NK037(ji)010:59: khyad par bdag bskyed yi dam kyi thugs srog gi 'od zer gyis mgon po lha tshogs bskul /
NK037(ji)010:60: de dag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros dregs
NK037(ji)010:61: pa can thams cad kyi srog snying nus mthu bcas
NK037(ji)010:62: bkug nas gtso bo'i thugs kar thim zhing /
NK037(ji)010:63: gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi mthu byin nus stobs thams
NK037(ji)010:64: cad byang sems dkar dmar gyi rnam par babs nas
NK037(ji)010:65: bum thod gtor ma sogs la thim pas so so'i
NK037(ji)010:66: byin nus dang ldan par bsam nas /
NK037(ji)010:67: bee ro'i sngags 'grigs bzhin gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi sngags grangs mang nyung go rim bzhin bzla ba'am /
NK037(ji)010:68: mi nus na gzhung gsal gyi sngags brgya stong ci
NK037(ji)010:69: 'grub bzlas la mthar mchod bstod dang 'od zer gyis
NK037(ji)010:70: bdag dbang len / de nas las bum bsang sbyang /
NK037(ji)010:71: stong pa'i ngang las las bum gyi nang du pad
NK037(ji)010:72: nyi la h'u las bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sku mdog
NK037(ji)010:73: ljang sngon g.yas rdo rje'i dbyug pa phyar zhing g.yon
NK037(ji)010:74: sdigs mdzub mdzad pa khro bo'i chas thams cad dang
NK037(ji)010:75: lngan pa'i thugs kar h'u gi mthar sngags kyis bskor
NK037(ji)010:76: bar gyur / badz+ra a mri ta kun+da l+ai ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK037(ji)010:78: khro bo khyod kyis bgegs rnams bzlog par mdzad du gsol /
NK037(ji)010:79: zhes gsol ba btab pas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'od
NK037(ji)010:80: du zhu nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu las sgrub
NK037(ji)010:81: pa thogs pa med pa'i nus ldan du gyur /
NK037(ji)010:83: de nas yi dam gyi gzhung bzhin tshogs 'khor dang
NK037(ji)010:84: spro na mgon po'i skong ba mnga' gsol bcas btang
NK037(ji)010:85: bar bya'o // gnyis pa slob ma la dbang bskur
NK037(ji)010:86: ba la'ang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa dang
NK037(ji)010:87: bar bya'o // / dngos gzhi dbang gi cho ga'o //
NK037(ji)010:89: snod ldan dam tshig thub nges pa'i slob ma rnams phyi rol du /
NK037(ji)010:90: ji ltar bltams pa sogs kyis khrus byas nas dbyung /
NK037(ji)010:91: bgegs gtor byin rlabs nas bsngo ba'i bar /
NK037(ji)010:92: chags med lugs kyis mtshon rnying ma rang lugs gang yin byas la /
NK037(ji)010:95: nga ni rab 'jigs khros pa'i rgyal //
NK037(ji)010:96: dbang chen 'bar ba'i skur ston pa //
NK037(ji)010:97: rta skad mtsher zhing h'u sgra sgrog /
NK037(ji)010:99: sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa //
NK037(ji)010:100: dpal chen khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
NK037(ji)010:101: klad pa tshad pa brgya ru khos //
NK037(ji)010:102: lus kyang dum bu stong du gtubs //
NK037(ji)010:104: gdug pa rang gi gnas su dengs //
NK037(ji)010:106: sum+b+ha ni sogs drag sngags dang rol mo yungs thun sogs tsham rngams kyis bgegs bskrad /
NK037(ji)010:107: badz+ra tsakra t+aik+na karma k+ai la ya dz+wa la ram rak+sha rak+sha h'u phata /
NK037(ji)010:109: me tog bkye bsdu byas la /
NK037(ji)010:110: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad sku
NK037(ji)010:111: bzhi ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid zung 'jug rdo rje
NK037(ji)010:112: 'chang chen po'i go 'phang la 'god par bya /
NK037(ji)010:113: de la bar du gcod pa'i dgra bgegs log par
NK037(ji)010:114: 'dren pa rnams mngon spyod drag po'i sgo nas tshar
NK037(ji)010:115: gcod nus pa'i ched du dpal mgon tshogs kyi bdag
NK037(ji)010:116: po'i smin byed kyi dbang bskur ba'i rim pa gsan
NK037(ji)010:117: la don tshul bzhin du nyams su blang bar bagyi'o
NK037(ji)010:118: snyam pa'i byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang
NK037(ji)010:119: / chos gsan pa'i kun spyod dri ma med pa gsal btab ste legs par gsan 'tshal /
NK037(ji)010:120: de la gsan par bya ba gsang sngags rdo rje
NK037(ji)010:121: theg pa bla med yo ga rnam gsum gyi chos
NK037(ji)010:122: tshul zab cing rgya che ba dpag tu med pa
NK037(ji)010:123: zhig mchis pa las bstan srung yongs kyi gtso bo
NK037(ji)010:124: / bing chen brtsegs pa'i rgyud las bstan cing drag
NK037(ji)010:125: sngags kun gyi mthar thug pa mgon po tshogs kyi
NK037(ji)010:126: bdag po'i dbang bskur bka' gtad bcas bsgrub pa ste
NK037(ji)010:127: / / de yang phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba
NK037(ji)010:128: thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang gzugs 'phags mchog phyag
NK037(ji)010:129: na pad+ma de nyid ngo bo chos sku zhi las
NK037(ji)010:130: ma g.yos kyang rol rtsal 'gags med zhi chags khro
NK037(ji)010:131: bo'i sgyu 'phrul bsam las 'das pa dang gang 'dul
NK037(ji)010:132: phrin las kyi rnam rol mtha' yas pas 'khor ba
NK037(ji)010:133: dong nas sprugs par mdzad pa las /
NK037(ji)010:134: bstan 'gror 'tshe ba'i gdug pa can zhi bas mi
NK037(ji)010:135: 'dul ba rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir dpal mgon tshogs
NK037(ji)010:136: kyi bdag po'i skur sprul nas rgyud man ngag dang
NK037(ji)010:137: bcas pa sa brgyad dbang phyug rgyal chen rnam thos
NK037(ji)010:138: sras la gsungs / des grub pa'i slob dpon chen po d+ha na sam skri ta la bshad /
NK037(ji)010:139: de nas bod du chos rgyal khri srong lde'u btsan
NK037(ji)010:140: la rgya nag gi rgyal po lang ka pany+tsa zhes
NK037(ji)010:142: bee ro tsa na la de 'dul ba'i man ngag
NK037(ji)010:143: tshol bar bskul bas bee ros rgyud dang man ngag
NK037(ji)010:144: yongs su rdzogs pa slob dpon d+ha na sam skri
NK037(ji)010:146: bod yul du phebs nas chos rgyal chen po la'ang gnang ste bzhed pa tshul bzhin bskangs /
NK037(ji)010:147: shar rgyal mo rong du gsang sngags rdo rje theg
NK037(ji)010:148: pa'i bstan pa rgyas par byed pa'i ched du phra
NK037(ji)010:149: ma snga btsan gyi bardzu bag byas nas yul thon
NK037(ji)010:150: pa'i tshul gyis phebs pa'i lam khar mdo smad du
NK037(ji)010:151: ldi ri chos kyi grags pa sogs skal ldan gyi
NK037(ji)010:152: slob ma mang po zhig drag sngags gsang ba spu
NK037(ji)010:153: gri'i sgo nas rjes su bzung /
NK037(ji)010:154: rgya dpe ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i ched du gser
NK037(ji)010:155: stod kyi 'brong ri smug por gter du sbas pa
NK037(ji)010:156: phyis gter ston chu pho rtogs ldan gyis bton nas
NK037(ji)010:157: ming lung bla nag dge 'dun rgyal mtshan la gnang
NK037(ji)010:158: / brgyud pa mang po'i bar du dngos grub brnyes pa sha stag byon cing /
NK037(ji)010:159: mthar la bstod nam mkha' rin chen la bka' babs /
NK037(ji)010:160: dam pa de nyid nas bka' ma gsang ba spu gri dang /
NK037(ji)010:161: chu pho rtogs ldan gyis bton pa'i gter ma gnyis ka chu bo gcig 'dres su gyur /
NK037(ji)010:162: mdo khams smad kyi phyogs mtha' dbus kun tu bsnyen
NK037(ji)010:163: sgrub gsol mchod kyi rgyun dbyar mtsho ltar 'phel bar
NK037(ji)010:165: tshul de lta bu'i smin byed sgrub pa la bdag
NK037(ji)010:166: gis bya bar 'os pa rnams sngon tu song nas
NK037(ji)010:167: khyed cag gi ngo skal du gyur pa'i man+dala 'bul
NK037(ji)010:168: bar mdzod / ces man+dala 'bul du gzhug /
NK037(ji)010:169: snyim pa me tog dang bcas te gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:170: bla ma gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin //
NK037(ji)010:171: thugs rjes brtse bar dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:172: bdag cag sangs rgyas bstan bsrung phyir //
NK037(ji)010:173: nag po chen po'i dbang bskur zhu //
NK037(ji)010:176: skal ldan yin na dam tshig rnams //
NK037(ji)010:177: srog la bab kyang bsrung nus sam //
NK037(ji)010:178: zhes dris pa'i lan du 'di'i rjes zlos //
NK037(ji)010:179: bla ma dpal chen he ru ka /
NK037(ji)010:180: ci gsung bka' stsal tshul bzhin bsrung //
NK037(ji)010:181: yi dam bsgrub cing chos skyong mchod //
NK037(ji)010:183: rgyud rnam par dag cing dbang dang dam tshig gi snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK037(ji)010:184: bla ma dang dpal ldan mgon po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK037(ji)010:185: lha tshogs la sangs rgyas byang sems rtsa gsum chos
NK037(ji)010:186: skyong rgya mtshos sprin gtibs pa ltar bskor te bzhugs
NK037(ji)010:187: pa'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro zhing byang chub mchog
NK037(ji)010:188: tu sems bskyed pa'i 'dun pas 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:189: bla ma dkon mchog yi dam lha //
NK037(ji)010:191: bdag sogs 'gro kun skyabs su mchi //
NK037(ji)010:192: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
NK037(ji)010:194: bsags sbyang yan lag brgyad pa'i dmigs 'dun tshul bzhin mdzad nas 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:195: phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
NK037(ji)010:196: bla ma yi dam chos skyong la //
NK037(ji)010:197: bdag sogs 'gro kun skyabs su mchi //
NK037(ji)010:198: lus ngag yid gsum gus phyag 'tshal //
NK037(ji)010:199: phyi nang gsang gsum chod pa 'bul //
NK037(ji)010:200: sdig pa'i tshogs rnams mthol lo bshags //
NK037(ji)010:201: rang gzhan dge la rjes yi rang //
NK037(ji)010:202: theg chen chos 'khor bskor bar bskul //
NK037(ji)010:203: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:204: dge ba byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK037(ji)010:206: rigs lnga'i sdom pa thun mong dang khyad par gyis
NK037(ji)010:207: bsdus pa rnams 'dzin par bya'o snyam pas 'di'i rjes
NK037(ji)010:208: zlos / dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang ngo //
NK037(ji)010:209: rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK037(ji)010:210: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang //
NK037(ji)010:211: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
NK037(ji)010:212: rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK037(ji)010:213: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
NK037(ji)010:214: pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK037(ji)010:215: theg pa gsum dang chos rnams bshad //
NK037(ji)010:216: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK037(ji)010:217: 'gro ba'i don la brtson par bya //
NK037(ji)010:218: de bzhin rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK037(ji)010:220: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig kun //
NK037(ji)010:221: ma lus bdag gis yongs su bzung //
NK037(ji)010:224: khyed cag rnams khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i rgyu
NK037(ji)010:225: lhan skyes kyi ma rig pas don dam ye shes
NK037(ji)010:226: kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa mtshon pa'i phyir dar sngon
NK037(ji)010:227: pos mthong byed bkab par mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:228: tsak+sha rban+d+ha w+aa ra m+aa na ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)010:230: dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang mjal ba'i tshe phyag stong
NK037(ji)010:231: par mjal du mi rung bas phyag rten gyi ched
NK037(ji)010:232: du me tog gsar pa'i phreng ba re gtad pa'i
NK037(ji)010:236: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas spros pa'i khro bo'i
NK037(ji)010:237: tshogs kyis dbang gi ye shes skye ba la bar
NK037(ji)010:238: du gcod pa'i bgegs thams cad bskrad par mos shig
NK037(ji)010:240: h'u h'u h'u bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la
NK037(ji)010:241: man+dala phata phata phata ha la ha la ha la
NK037(ji)010:243: rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:244: khyod kyis nga la brnyas mi bya //
NK037(ji)010:246: ma mthong rnams la smra mi bya //
NK037(ji)010:247: rdo rje spun dang sring mo la //
NK037(ji)010:248: nam yang brnyas pa spang bar gyis //
NK037(ji)010:250: ye shes pa dbab pa ni /
NK037(ji)010:251: dbang gi gzhi ye shes pa dbab pa la dmigs pa 'di bzhin rtse gcig tu mdzad 'tshal /
NK037(ji)010:252: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros //
NK037(ji)010:253: khyed rang rnams la phog pas ma dag pa'i dngos
NK037(ji)010:254: po sbyangs nas 'od zer mthing kha'i phung por gyur
NK037(ji)010:255: / de las dur khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang
NK037(ji)010:256: chen po'i dbus su dgra bgegs kyi ro gan rkyal
NK037(ji)010:257: gyi steng du pad nyi zla ba'i gdan la khyed
NK037(ji)010:258: rang rnams ngo bo dbang chen rta mchog he ru
NK037(ji)010:259: ka yin pa la rnam pa dpal mgon tshogs kyi
NK037(ji)010:260: bdag po sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig mi sdug
NK037(ji)010:261: srin po khros pa'i rnam 'gyur can /
NK037(ji)010:262: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum sdang mig can du
NK037(ji)010:263: gzigs shing zla tshes lta bu'i mche ba bzhi gtsigs
NK037(ji)010:264: pa / phyag gnyis g.yas pas tsan+dana gyi bing chen
NK037(ji)010:265: nam mkhar phyar zhing g.yon na thod khrag dang kha
NK037(ji)010:267: sku la dar nag 'jol ber dgu brtsegs mnab cing /
NK037(ji)010:268: rin po che dang dar dpyangs kyi sku regs dang /
NK037(ji)010:269: gser gyi gwa'u rdzu 'phrul gser sbrang gis bkang ba
NK037(ji)010:270: zung sbrel du bcing zhing dbu skra kham nag gyen
NK037(ji)010:271: du bardzesa pa / rin po che dang sbrul rigs lnga'i do shal dang yan lag rnams spras pa /
NK037(ji)010:272: the tso dang ne tso sogs kyi phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa /
NK037(ji)010:273: stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs byas shing /
NK037(ji)010:274: zhabs la sag ti'i lhwam po che mnabs pa /
NK037(ji)010:275: gzugs thung la gzi brjid che ba shin tu 'jigs shing rab tu rngams pa /
NK037(ji)010:276: bskal pa'i me dpung dmar nag 'thor rlung drag pos
NK037(ji)010:277: rab tu bskyod pa'i dbus na khams gsum srid pa
NK037(ji)010:278: gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mthu stobs nus rtsal
NK037(ji)010:279: rab tu 'bar zhing gar gyi nyams dgu'i zil gyis
NK037(ji)010:280: 'chi bdag gshin rje'i dpung tshogs 'dar zhing zhum par
NK037(ji)010:281: nus pa / 'khor 'das yongs kyi spyi dpal chen
NK037(ji)010:282: por rang byung lhun gyis grub pa'i skur gsal ba'i
NK037(ji)010:283: spyi bor zla ba'i steng du dkar po /
NK037(ji)010:284: mgrin par pad+ma'i steng du +aah dmar po /
NK037(ji)010:285: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'u sngon po rnams
NK037(ji)010:286: rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba gsum gyi ngo bor
NK037(ji)010:287: gsal ba'i 'od zer glog gi zhags pa lta bur
NK037(ji)010:288: 'phros / phyogs bcu'i zhing rab 'byams na bzhugs pa'i
NK037(ji)010:289: rgyal ba zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor ma lus shing lus
NK037(ji)010:290: pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa thams
NK037(ji)010:291: cad dpal mgon tshogs kyi bdag po'i rnam par gyur
NK037(ji)010:292: nas h'u sgra dang bswo sgra cha sgra 'brug stong
NK037(ji)010:293: ldir ba lta bu dang bcas te sa gsum gyi
NK037(ji)010:294: gnas rnams g.yo 'gul 'phar ldeg byed cing nam mkha'i
NK037(ji)010:295: dbyings nas sprin nag rlung gis bskyod pa lta bu
NK037(ji)010:296: 'phros / / bar snang khams nas skyin thang chu 'khyag drag tu 'khrugs pa lta bu /
NK037(ji)010:297: sa gzhi'i khams nas 'thor rlung drag pos na bun
NK037(ji)010:298: bskyod pa bzhin du mkhyen brtse'i nus stobs kyi byin
NK037(ji)010:300: las chen bzhi dang dbang phyug brgyad sogs thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
NK037(ji)010:301: bde stong 'gyur med sku lnga ye shes lnga sogs
NK037(ji)010:302: mchog gi dngos grub dang bcas rdo tshan la kha
NK037(ji)010:303: babs pa'am / rgya mtsho la char rgyun thim pa
NK037(ji)010:304: bzhin khyed rang rnams la gnyis med du thim pa'i
NK037(ji)010:306: gu gul dud pa rol mo'i sgra dang bcas spro na gab thig ltar spyan 'dren brjod /
NK037(ji)010:308: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la sa pa ri b+aa ra
NK037(ji)010:309: badz+ra dz+ny+aa na +aa be sha ya phem phem h'u
NK037(ji)010:310: h'u h'u e +aa ral+li sa ma ya hrim hrim
NK037(ji)010:311: dzahdzah zhes dang / e h+ye hi sh+r+ai ma h+aa
NK037(ji)010:312: k+aa la dzah h'u bam hoh +aa gats+tsha ya +aa
NK037(ji)010:313: dzahdzah zhes dang / gats+tsha ya / tish+tha badz+ra sa ma ya h'u /
NK037(ji)010:314: zhes drag tu brjod la byin dbab /
NK037(ji)010:315: ye shes pa sgo gsum la brtan par byas pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK037(ji)010:316: rdo rje rgya gram du mgor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:317: +aahmh'u e rdub e badz+ra san+ta hril pa h+r+aih u ni ni e lam mi ni h'u /
NK037(ji)010:318: dz+ny+aa na sat+wa ti sh+tha badz+ra /
NK037(ji)010:320: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo bzhi nas 'jug par gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:321: bla ma lha dang chos skyong gi //
NK037(ji)010:322: pho brang chen po'i sgo bzhi ru //
NK037(ji)010:323: bdag cag 'jug cing bsnyen sgrub spro //
NK037(ji)010:324: ye shes chen po'i sgo phyes shig /
NK037(ji)010:325: badz+ra ud+g+ha ta pra be sha ya phata /
NK037(ji)010:327: pho brang chen po'i shar sgo ru //
NK037(ji)010:328: sogs phyogs so sor brjod par gsungs so //
NK037(ji)010:329: man+dala tshom bu can nam rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan bris pa'i 'grim dkyil bkod la /
NK037(ji)010:330: sngar byin pa'i cod pan rang rigs kyi lha la
NK037(ji)010:331: 'bul ba'i mos pas rjes zlos dang lhan cig dkyil
NK037(ji)010:333: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:334: bdag cag rig pa'i me tog 'di //
NK037(ji)010:336: thugs rje brtse bas bzhes su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:339: lhag pa'i lha dang chos skyong la phog pas /
NK037(ji)010:340: de nyid slar yang dbang rtags dngos grub kyi rdzas su byin par mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:342: lhan skyes sgrib pas ldongs pa'i ma rig pa spyan dar dang lhan cig bsal bar mos mdzod /
NK037(ji)010:344: ces thur mas gdong g.yogs bsal /
NK037(ji)010:345: rin chen ri rab gzhal yas khang mtshan nyid yongs
NK037(ji)010:346: su rdzogs pa'i nang mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i
NK037(ji)010:347: dbus su dpal ldan mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po
NK037(ji)010:349: sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po /
NK037(ji)010:354: lha dang dgra bla'i dmag tshogs /
NK037(ji)010:355: sprul pa yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba /
NK037(ji)010:356: ye shes gcig gi rol pa las gang 'dul gyi
NK037(ji)010:357: rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang 'char ba'i rten dang
NK037(ji)010:358: brten par bcas pa mngon sum bzhin du mthong bar
NK037(ji)010:359: mos shig / badz+ra pa sh+ya hoh zhes lha ngo bstan /
NK037(ji)010:360: de dag gis 'jug pa'i chos rnams grub pa lags /
NK037(ji)010:361: dngos gzhi dbang bskur zhu ba'i yon tu dmigs te man+dala phul /
NK037(ji)010:362: dbang dngos la sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK037(ji)010:363: yongs rdzogs bka' gtad dang bcas pa rnams su yod
NK037(ji)010:364: pa las / thog mar sku bum pa'i dbang gi slad du gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:365: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:366: nag po chen po'i sku yi dbang //
NK037(ji)010:367: deng 'dir bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:368: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros /
NK037(ji)010:369: dbang gi lha rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa badz+ra sa ma ya dzahdzahsa spyan drang /
NK037(ji)010:372: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slob ma la mngon par dbang bskur ba stsal du gsol /
NK037(ji)010:374: bkra shis pa'i rnam pa du ma dang ldan pas
NK037(ji)010:375: rin po che'i bum pa ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu
NK037(ji)010:376: rgyun gyis gang bas khyed rang rnams kyi spyi bo
NK037(ji)010:377: nas dbang bskur bar mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:379: rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis bkang //
NK037(ji)010:380: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)010:381: sku yi dbang mchog thob par shog /
NK037(ji)010:382: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da k+aa ya a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK037(ji)010:383: bum chu sbyin cing khrus bya /
NK037(ji)010:384: des mgon po'i sku'i mthu stobs nus byin la dbang bar byas pa yin no //
NK037(ji)010:385: de dang rjes su 'brel ba nag po chen po
NK037(ji)010:386: gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi dbang bskur ba'i slad du
NK037(ji)010:387: / slob dpon gyi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis mdun bskyed bskul /
NK037(ji)010:388: mdun bskyed gtso 'khor rnams kyi sku las sku gnyis
NK037(ji)010:389: pa re 'phros nas slob ma lhar gsal ba la
NK037(ji)010:392: gtso bo'i sku dang snying po bcas spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:394: tshogs bdag khrag 'thung chen po yis //
NK037(ji)010:395: dpal chen spyan sngar khas blangs bzhin //
NK037(ji)010:396: skal ldan 'di yi srung ma mdzod //
NK037(ji)010:397: bdud dang dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /
NK037(ji)010:398: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:399: de nas yum sku spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:401: yum chen yak+sha be t+aa lis /
NK037(ji)010:402: dpal chen spyan sngar khas blangs bzhin //
NK037(ji)010:403: skal ldan 'di yi srung ma mdzod //
NK037(ji)010:404: badz+ra yak+sha be t+aa li a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:407: sde brgyad kyi tsakli rnams rim par lag tu gtad la /
NK037(ji)010:409: dpal chen sku yi mgon po yis //
NK037(ji)010:410: sngon tshe dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)010:411: khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du //
NK037(ji)010:412: skal ldan 'di yi srung ma mdzod //
NK037(ji)010:413: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la k+aa ya a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK037(ji)010:415: dpal chen gsung gi mgon po yis //
NK037(ji)010:416: sngon tshe dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)010:417: khas blangs dam bcas skal ldan 'di yi sh+r+ai ma
NK037(ji)010:418: h+aa k+aa la w+aa ka a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah dpal
NK037(ji)010:419: chen thugs kyi mgon po yis //
NK037(ji)010:420: sngon tshe dpal chen khas blangs skal ldan sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la tsit+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:422: shar phyogs mgon po dri za'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:423: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan 'di ma h+aa k+aa la +aar+ya re man+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:425: lho phyogs mgon po gshin rje'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:426: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la tad shad dzaha b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:428: nub phyogs mgon po klu bdud tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:429: sngon tshe dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)010:430: khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la me tri ma ru ke ye a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:432: byang phyogs mgon po gnod sbyin tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:433: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan /
NK037(ji)010:434: ma h+aa k+aa la bee sh+ra ma na ye a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:436: shar lho mgon po me lha'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:437: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la +aar+ya dzam b+ha la a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:439: lho nub mgon po srin po'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:440: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la d+he wa ni ri ti a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:442: nub byang mgon po rlung lha'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:443: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la
NK037(ji)010:444: ru g+ho ru g+ha ni ru g+he a b+hi shiny+tsa
NK037(ji)010:446: byang shar mgon po dbang ldan tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:447: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la +ai sha na ye a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:449: steng phyogs mgon po gza' chen tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:450: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la tsan+d+ra ye a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:452: 'og phyogs mgon po sa bdag tshogs //
NK037(ji)010:453: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la +aa d+hi pa ti b+h+yo a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:455: srid pa lha yi gtso bo yis //
NK037(ji)010:456: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la a de wa rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:458: gshin rje ya ma r+aa dza yis //
NK037(ji)010:459: sngon tshe dpal chen khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa
NK037(ji)010:460: k+aa la ya ya ma rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u
NK037(ji)010:462: ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo yis //
NK037(ji)010:463: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la ma ma ma rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:465: bdud po skos rje brang dkar gyis //
NK037(ji)010:466: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la du pra ma rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:468: btsan rje srog len dmar po yis //
NK037(ji)010:469: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la ru a shwa rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:471: dgra lha'i rgyal po pe har gyis //
NK037(ji)010:472: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la tsa r+aa dza rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:474: gnod sbyin k+aa la yak+sha yis //
NK037(ji)010:475: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la sha yak+sha rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:477: klu bdud 'chi bdag mgo dgu yis //
NK037(ji)010:478: sngon tshe khas blangs skal ldan ma h+aa k+aa la na n+aa ga rak+sha a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:482: tshogs kyi bdag po yab yum gyis //
NK037(ji)010:485: sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po yis //
NK037(ji)010:488: phyogs bcu'i mgon po 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)010:491: sde brgyad mgon po 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)010:492: sngon tshe sogs tshan bzhir bsdu zhing /
NK037(ji)010:494: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:495: zhes pa kho na brjod kyang don 'thus so //
NK037(ji)010:496: gnyis pa gsung sngags kyi dbang bskur ba la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:497: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:498: nag po chen po'i gsung gi dbang //
NK037(ji)010:499: deng 'dir bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:500: de nas slob dpon la gus 'dud byas pa'i rkyen
NK037(ji)010:501: gyis slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas
NK037(ji)010:502: sngags kyi phreng ba thon pa slob ma'i khar zhugs
NK037(ji)010:503: / snying ga'i sa bon gyi mthar g.yas bskor du 'khod par bsam la 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:504: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la h'u phata /
NK037(ji)010:505: badz+ra yak+sha be t+aa li h'u /
NK037(ji)010:506: ma h+aa k+aa la sid+d+hi yam du dzah sh+r+ai ma
NK037(ji)010:507: h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da k+aa ya w+aa
NK037(ji)010:508: ka tsit+ta dgra bgegs sarba sha t+r+aum m+aa ra ya
NK037(ji)010:510: me tog 'thor bzhin du 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:511: bcom ldan bdag la stsal lags kyis //
NK037(ji)010:512: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:514: slob dpon gyis me tog 'thor bzhin du /
NK037(ji)010:515: bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
NK037(ji)010:517: sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:518: brtul zhugs brtan par mdzad du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:519: dpal mgon tshogs kyi bdag po'i byin rlabs nus stobs
NK037(ji)010:520: thams cad slob ma 'di dag gi rgyud la 'jug
NK037(ji)010:521: par gyur cig / ces brjod cing /
NK037(ji)010:522: thod chang mgrin par bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:524: bdud rtsi chen po'i thod pa 'di //
NK037(ji)010:525: skal ldan bu la byin pa yis //
NK037(ji)010:526: nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi //
NK037(ji)010:527: gsung gi dbang mchog thob par shog /
NK037(ji)010:528: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da w+aa ka a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah zhes bdud rtsi blud /
NK037(ji)010:529: des nag po chen po'i gsung gi nus pa la dbang bar byas pa yin no //
NK037(ji)010:531: gsum pa thugs kyi dbang bskur zhu ba'i ched 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK037(ji)010:533: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:534: nag po chen po'i thugs kyi dbang //
NK037(ji)010:535: deng 'dir bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:536: zhes gsol ba btab pas slob dpon dang mdun bskyed
NK037(ji)010:537: kyi thugs ka nas phyag mtshan dpag tu med pa
NK037(ji)010:538: byon slob ma'i snying gar thim pas yid kyi sdig
NK037(ji)010:539: sgrib dag thugs kyi byin rlabs zhugs par mos shig
NK037(ji)010:540: / tsit+ta srog 'khor snying gar bzhag la /
NK037(ji)010:542: lha dang dam can thugs kyi rten //
NK037(ji)010:544: nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi //
NK037(ji)010:545: thugs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog /
NK037(ji)010:546: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da tsit+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:547: slob ma lhar gsal ba nyid yas mas nas rim
NK037(ji)010:548: pas 'od du zhu ste snying ga'i h'u gi n+aa
NK037(ji)010:550: n+aa da yang mi dmigs par mnyam par bzhag /
NK037(ji)010:551: slar h'u zhes pa'i sgras mgon po'i skur skad cig gis gsal btab pas /
NK037(ji)010:552: mgon po'i thugs kyi ye shes la dbang bar byas pa yin no //
NK037(ji)010:554: bzhi pa yon tan gyi dbang la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:555: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:556: nag po chen po'i yon tan dbang //
NK037(ji)010:557: deng 'dir bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:558: slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas 'od
NK037(ji)010:559: zer 'phros gtor ma lhar gsal ba'i thugs rgyud bskul
NK037(ji)010:560: bas spyi bo nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dmigs 'dun
NK037(ji)010:562: lha dang dam can sgrub pa'i rdzas //
NK037(ji)010:563: dam rdzas gtor ma'i dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)010:564: nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi //
NK037(ji)010:565: yon tan lhun grub dbang thob shog /
NK037(ji)010:566: a sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da gu na a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:567: bcom ldan phyag na pad+ma yis //
NK037(ji)010:568: bstan 'gro'i mgon du dbang bskur ba //
NK037(ji)010:569: lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po ni //
NK037(ji)010:570: yab yum sras 'khor bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)010:573: e h+ye hi sogs yab yum gyi 'bod sngags tshar gcig brjod mthar /
NK037(ji)010:574: dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan tshogs kyi
NK037(ji)010:575: bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rtsa ba
NK037(ji)010:576: dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams
NK037(ji)010:577: kyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar rigs kyi
NK037(ji)010:578: bu 'di'i srung ma mdzod la lus dang grib ma
NK037(ji)010:580: 'gal rkyen bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad
NK037(ji)010:581: zhi zhing mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam sbyor
NK037(ji)010:582: thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang /
NK037(ji)010:583: rnam bzhi'i phrin las thams cad g.yel ba med par 'grub par mdzad du gsol /
NK037(ji)010:585: gtor ma'i lha 'od du zhu nas khyed rang rnams la thim par mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:586: des mgon po'i yon tan gyi gter mdzod la dbang bar byas pa yin no //
NK037(ji)010:588: lnga pa phrin las drag po sgrol ba'i dbang la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:589: bla ma lhar bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)010:590: nag po chen po'i phrin las dbang //
NK037(ji)010:591: deng 'dir bdag la stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)010:592: mdun du hom khung du ling+ga bshams shir rak+ta bran nas /
NK037(ji)010:594: lcags bsregs kyi brub khung gru gsum pa'i nang du
NK037(ji)010:595: n+ri dang tri las dgra bgegs shin tu rid cing
NK037(ji)010:596: nyam thag pa'i rnam pa can du gyur /
NK037(ji)010:597: mgon po'i sprul pa'i dmag tshogs nam mkha' gang bar spros /
NK037(ji)010:598: de rnams kyis drag po'i las mdzad par bsam la /
NK037(ji)010:599: bden stobs brjod de dmigs bya 'gug gzhug bya /
NK037(ji)010:601: bdud 'dul tshogs bdag chen po ste //
NK037(ji)010:602: rdo rje skul byed drag po rtsal //
NK037(ji)010:603: rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)010:604: khram la btab pa'i dgra bgegs rnasama //
NK037(ji)010:605: m+aa ra ya yi las bcol gyi //
NK037(ji)010:606: tshe srog hur thum myur du sgrol //
NK037(ji)010:607: rol cig dgongs shig dam tshig can //
NK037(ji)010:608: khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab //
NK037(ji)010:609: zhe sdang dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams //
NK037(ji)010:610: sems can gdug pa'i srog phrog la //
NK037(ji)010:611: sha la zo zhing khrag la 'thung //
NK037(ji)010:612: dam nyams dgra bo myur du sgrol //
NK037(ji)010:613: m+aa ra ya yi dus la bab //
NK037(ji)010:615: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la sogs 'bod rbad bsad pa'i
NK037(ji)010:616: sngags brjod pa dang chab gcig slob bu'i lag tu
NK037(ji)010:617: sgrol phur dang mtshon cha thun rdzas sogs gtad pa'i
NK037(ji)010:618: ling+ka la gdab bcug cing dbang bskur ba ni /
NK037(ji)010:620: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyag cha 'di //
NK037(ji)010:621: skal ldan khyod la sbyin pa yis //
NK037(ji)010:622: nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyis //
NK037(ji)010:623: phrin las dbang chog thob par shog /
NK037(ji)010:624: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la gu na hri da karma a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:626: ling ro bdud rtsi dang sbyar ba gcig thog mar mgon po la phul /
NK037(ji)010:627: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag rus pa la kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)010:628: zhes dum gcig dang sman raka sbyar te /
NK037(ji)010:629: khyed rang rnams dpal ldan mgon po'i nga rgyal dang
NK037(ji)010:630: ldan pas dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag rus pa bdud
NK037(ji)010:631: rtsi'i rang bzhin du rol par mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:632: lhag ma dkyil 'khor ba spyi la /
NK037(ji)010:633: 'khor tshogs dam can rgya mtsho rnams kyis dgra bgegs kyi sogs sngags kyis bstab /
NK037(ji)010:634: des mgon po'i phrin las kyi mthu stobs dang nus
NK037(ji)010:635: pa thams cad la dbang bar byas pa yin no
NK037(ji)010:636: // drug pa mtha' rten bka' gtad kyi dbang bskur ba la /
NK037(ji)010:637: khyed rang rnams dpal ldan mgon por gsal ba la
NK037(ji)010:638: slob dpon nyid dpal chen he ru ka dngos su
NK037(ji)010:639: snang bas bka' bsgom pa tsam gyis mgon po 'khor
NK037(ji)010:640: bcas lus dang grib bzhin 'bral ba med par 'grogs
NK037(ji)010:641: pa dang chos bka' phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa
NK037(ji)010:642: la rang dbang du gyur pa mos shig /
NK037(ji)010:643: sku gzugs yongs rdzogs spyi bor bzhag /
NK037(ji)010:644: sgrub yig lag tu gtad la /
NK037(ji)010:646: bka' srung dam can ma lus rnams //
NK037(ji)010:647: sngon tshe dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)010:648: khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du //
NK037(ji)010:649: skal ldan 'di yi srung ma mdzod //
NK037(ji)010:650: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)010:653: skal ldan sgrub mchog dam tshig can //
NK037(ji)010:654: yi dam lha mchog rgyun du sgrubs //
NK037(ji)010:655: chos skyong srung ma rtag tu mchod //
NK037(ji)010:656: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis //
NK037(ji)010:657: dgra bgegs dam nyams myur du sgrol //
NK037(ji)010:658: man ngag dam pa gsang bar chongs //
NK037(ji)010:659: gdams pa gtad do thub par srungs //
NK037(ji)010:661: de nas me tog 'thor zhing shis brjod kyi tshig rgyas bsdus ji ltar rigs pa spel /
NK037(ji)010:662: de ltar dpal mgon tshogs kyi bdag po bka' gter
NK037(ji)010:663: zung 'brel gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bka' gtad
NK037(ji)010:664: bcas legs par thob pa ste /
NK037(ji)010:665: deng phyin chad mgon po nyid rtag tu mi 'bral bar srung skyob mdzad pa chos nyid yin pas /
NK037(ji)010:666: khyed rang rnams kyis kyang spyir mchod gtor la brtson pa dang /
NK037(ji)010:669: nyi shu dgu rnams la dus kyi gtor ma ma chags pa dang /
NK037(ji)010:670: snod min log lta can la sku mi bstan /
NK037(ji)010:672: bya nag khyi nag la gnod 'tshe spong ba sogs
NK037(ji)010:673: spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas par
NK037(ji)010:674: bya ba gal shin tu che bas tshul bzhin du
NK037(ji)010:675: bagyi'o snyam pa'i blos 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK037(ji)010:680: gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba ni /
NK037(ji)010:681: slar yang gtor mchod kha gsos la mgon po'i skong ba dang mnga' gsol /
NK037(ji)010:682: nongs pa la bzod gsol bya /
NK037(ji)010:683: tshogs la rol zhing lhag ma chad brtan sogs kyi
NK037(ji)010:684: rjes rim rnams yi dam gyi gzhung bzhin byas pas
NK037(ji)010:685: 'grub bo // 'di ni spros bcas dbang bskur rgyas pa'i lugs yin la /
NK037(ji)010:686: bsdus par 'dod na la ston gyi gzhung las /
NK037(ji)010:687: spros chung gtor ma la brten nas //
NK037(ji)010:688: sku gsung thugs yon phrin las kyi //
NK037(ji)010:689: rjes gnang phyag len mdzad par gda' //
NK037(ji)010:690: zhes gsungs pa ltar bgyis pas kyang don 'grub pa yin no //
NK037(ji)010:691: mthu myur byin rlabs che bar yongs su grags //
NK037(ji)010:692: mchod bstod khri 'bum byed pas mdo smad khyab //
NK037(ji)010:693: tshe 'di don gnyer smin grol tshol ba dkon //
NK037(ji)010:694: kha khral 'jal bas mgon po 'grub par rloms //
NK037(ji)010:695: de 'dra'i rigs can rnams dang chos 'di la //
NK037(ji)010:696: don du gnyer kun bstan pa rgyas bya dang //
NK037(ji)010:697: thar lam bgrod pa'i sems bskyed bzang po yis //
NK037(ji)010:699: ces pa'ang pad+ma'i sngags rig 'dzin pa'i rtags tsam 'chang
NK037(ji)010:700: ba pad+ma gar dbang blo gros mtha' yas pa'i sdes
NK037(ji)010:701: bshad sgrub rtag brtan dar rgyas gling du la ston
NK037(ji)010:702: nam kha' rin chen gyi gsung rtsa bar bzung /
NK037(ji)010:703: bla ma brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes ji ltar mdzad pa
